data.message: Modularized 2205-line OrganicText monolith into reusable library: Created lib/typography (algorithms) and components/typography (React). 10 variants: base, gradient, accent, animated, depth, tapering, refined, particle, contour, wireframe3d. Build passes, backwards compatible.
data.task: Modularized 2205-line OrganicText monolith into reusable library
data.outcome: Created lib/typography (algorithms) and components/typography (React). 10 variants: base, gradient, accent, animated, depth, tapering, refined, particle, contour, wireframe3d. Build passes, backwards compatible.
